episode.title: An Italicized “Finally”
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Rene Ritchie returns to the show for a look at what we expect — and hope — to see from Apple at WWDC next week.
episode.showNotes:
Special guest Rene Ritchie returns to the show for a look at what we expect — and hope — to see from Apple at WWDC next week.
